nodes.name: owner

nodes.documentation:
@title ContractInfo Human readable contraction information registry. Implimentation of ERC***.
Allow contract owner attach human readable information to contract and it's functions. Wallets such as
MetaMask, Imtoken, Status, Toshi etc. could display those information to users when they about to confirm
Ethereum transaction.
nodes.name: ContractInfo

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than contract owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

typeDescriptions.typeString: mapping(address => mapping(bytes4 => mapping(bytes5 => string storage ref)))
